radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild atelectatic changes at both lung bases; gallbladder contains stones and is distended with evidence of wall edema; hyperemia in hepatic parenchyma adjacent to gallbladder; multiple hypodense lesions in liver likely representing stable hepatic cysts; bilateral kidneys contain multiple hypodense foci and cysts; colonic diverticulosis without diverticulitis; uterus contains a fundal fibroid; right adnexal hypodense lesion measuring 3.1 x 2.2 cm stable; extensive degenerative changes in the right hip.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Stable findings in multiple hypodense lesions in the liver and right adnexal hypodense lesion compared to prior study.
